nodes.text: A battle occurred in the Obroa system during the Mandalorian Wars. In 3963 BBY, the Mandalorians began their full invasion of Galactic Republic territory, pressing out from their victory during the Taris Siege. One of the prongs of their assault sent them through Obroa.

The battle is only referenced once in The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the course of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose. In the Atlas, the Obroa system is denoted as the "Obroa-skai system" after the planet of Obroa-skai, which it contains.
